mapper.insert: insert into tbl_userreply(rno, bno, replytext, replyer, rgroup, userid) values (seq_userreply_rno.nextval, #{bno}, #{replytext}, #{replyer}, seq_userreply_rno.currval, #{userid})

insert into tbl_userreply( rno, bno, replytext, replyer, rgroup, rseq, rlevel, parentreplyer, userid) values (seq_userreply_rno.nextval, #{bno}, #{replytext}, #{replyer}, #{rgroup}, #{rseq}, 1, #{parentreplyer}, #{userid})
mapper.select: select rgroup from tbl_userreply where rno = #{rno}
mapper.update: update tbl_userreply set replytext = #{replytext}, replyer = #{replyer}, updatedate = sysdate where rno = #{rno}
